notes.interval_seconds: How often to check whale wallets (30-120 seconds recommended)
notes.transaction_lookback_count: How many recent transactions to check per wallet
notes.alert_cooldown_minutes: Don't alert on same token twice within this time
notes.min_liquidity_usd: Tokens below this liquidity are ignored (reduces rug risk)
notes.min_token_age_minutes: Ignore tokens younger than this (reduce instant rugs)
notes.max_token_age_hours: Ignore tokens older than this (we want early entries)
notes.min_whale_buy_usd: Only alert if whale spent at least this much USD
notes.min_sol_amount: Only track swaps where whale spent at least this many SOL
notes.risk_score_min: Only alert if safety score is at least this (1-10 scale)
notes.show_new_tokens_only: Only alert when whale buys a brand new token
notes.show_position_increases: Alert when whale adds to existing position
